official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the widow, widower, or former spouse of a law enforcement officer who dies in service after meeting the service requirement for entitlement to an annuity as a law enforcement officer, but before meeting the age requirement, shall be entitled to a survivor annuity computed as if the decedent had satisfied that age requirement.

summary.text: Entitles the widow, widower, or former spouse of a law enforcement officer who dies after satisfying the immediate retirement service requirement for entitlement to an annuity, but before satisfying the age requirement, to a survivor annuity determined as if the age requirement had been met. Provides for retroactive benefit payments to any survivor of an individual who died after 1985.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the widow, widower, or former spouse of a law enforcement officer who dies in service after meeting the service requirement for entitlement to an annuity as a law enforcement officer, but before meeting the age requirement, shall be entitled to a survivor annuity computed as if the decedent had satisfied that age requirement.
